About Your Dual Efficient Results

“Now that we have successfully found your metabolic type as Dual Efficient, we've also discovered that you have elevated symptoms.”

Heart Disease
A family history of heart disease ups your chances of getting the disease. Diet plays a huge role in keeping your risks low. You will want to consume a heart healthy diet that includes omega-3 fatty acids including salmon, walnuts, and olive. Antioxidant and beta-carotene rich foods like berries, carrots, sweet potatoes, and spinach will also lower your risk.
Diabetes
Uncontrolled blood sugar levels are common in diabetics who aren't consuming the right macronutrients, especially carbohydrates. Spacing out carbohydrates throughout the day is best way to keep blood sugar stable. How much and when to consume carbohydrates is individual for each person, meaning a specialized meal plan will be set for you.
Your Caloric Heat is Too Low
Each person has their own metabolic type, meaning you need an individualized nutrition plan just for you. Your "Golden Ratios" include eating the right amounts of protein, fat, and carbohydrates to keep metabolism running optimally and keep up with your goals.
Elias, Your Problem Is...
Based on your quiz results, losing weight will be difficult with your current situation.
Eating the wrong ratios of foods for your Dual Efficient weight loss type causes you to be locked in a constant battle with your body. Your hormones cause you to store fat, instead of burning it and your metabolism makes you work 4x harder than you need to.
Working out won't work for you to reach 256 pounds...
Eighty percent of weight loss results come from your diet. In fact, working out can actually be detrimental to you and even cause weight gain! With intense workouts alone, you're essentially fighting an uphill battle that very (very) few people win... You've probably tried everything to lose those 20 pounds and nothing ever works. Am I right??
Your solution is...

Just like my patients, you need the right guidance to know exactly what to eat, when to eat it and most importantly, the right ratios (portion sizes) that work for you and your specific Dual Efficient weight loss type. Step 1
Select the plan you want on the next page!
Immediately, you’ll be transported into your customized, secure web platform so you can view your plans, play around with the tracking tools and start planning your week.
You’ll have full access to everything you need, tracking tools for accountability, exchange system, body fat percentage calculator and so much more!
Plus: you'll find fat burning workouts and tons of other free resources inside the portal to help you along your weight loss journey!
Step 2
Customize your program how you like it!
Here's what's really cool about our custom meal plans and platform: We don't just email you a plan then tell you good luck.

We’re firm believers that the "best" diet is the one you stick with.
That's why I'm committed to delivering you a meal plan you'll truly enjoy and, more importantly, use.
If there's something you don't like about it, you can quickly change it at the click of a button!

to keep you on track for your goals**
